TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_balud, title = balud, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/balud} }

S.FORM: balud 綁 balud han ni Kacaw ku kasuy. siwkay nu balucu' pasiketay tu tuutuud , u lait ku sapasiketay. kyu kapah mikap malima. caay katahkal ku ilabuay a tuutuud saca aadupan. tinaku a kamu baludan 被綁 baludan nu misaydang kiya mabusukay a tatama. baluden 要同心協力 baluden ku balucu' nu niyazu' kiya icelang ku kamu! mabalud 被綁 mibalud 去綁 mabalud tu ku nisapudan nu maku a tudem. nibaludan 綁好的 mibalud kita tu nipenenan i buyu'. sabalud 用來綁的 sabalud ku masay tu kasuy.

balod 綁 balod han ni Kacaw ko kasoy. siwkay no baloco' pasiketay to tootood , o lait ko sapasiketay. kyo kapah mikap malima. caay katahkal ko ilaboay a tootood saca aadopan. tinako a kamo balodan 被綁 balodan no misaydang kiya mabosokay a tatama. baloden 要同心協力 baloden ko baloco' no niyazo' kiya icelang ko kamo! mabalod 被綁 mibalod 去綁 mabalod to ko nisapodan no mako a todem. nibalodan 綁好的 mibalod kita to nipenenan i boyo'. sabalod 用來綁的 sabalod ko masay to kasoy.
